text:
Stupeflix | Paris or remote | https://about.stupeflix.com/jobs

We're a small team of engineers passionate about video creation. We make Replay (replayapp.com), 2014 App of the Year in 34 countries, demoed on stage at Apple Keynote, 9M downloads and just getting started. Currently hiring Android, iOS, full stack web developers, creative coders and computer vision specialists. Join us!
